item.description:
This is the exhibition I mentioned at the photo meetup meetings, Let's all come out and show our support for the folks who got into this juried show! It's going to be a fun night of food, hanging out, and looking at photos. I hope you can join us...

BTW- Scotty got three images in the show- anyone else? Let's hear from you all!!

Wormtown Rocks! Exhibition

Public Reception: April 8, 6-8pm

Higgins Education Wing

Worcester has always been known for its lively music scene and its ability to nurture artists of all genres. This photo competition and exhibition is a dynamic and unique snapshot of the music scene of the area, highlighting both photographic as well as musical talents. Winners of this juried competition will be presented with cash awards on Thursday, April 8th, at the opening reception. A local exhibition not to be missed!

If you miss the opening night- The Wormtown Rocks Exhibition runs from April 6 - May 14- so go by and see it another time.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Wormtown Rocks! Exhibition- See Some Photo Meetup Members Works!
